amendment.description: To permit retired members of the Armed Forces who have a service-connected disability to receive both military retired pay by reason of their years of military service and disability compensation from the Department of Veterans Affairs for their disability.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 697 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 697 ruled non-germane by the chair.

Amendment SA 697 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: S6597-6598; text: CR S6597) To permit retired members of the Armed Forces who have a service-connected disability to receive both military retired pay by reason of their years of military service and disability compensation from the Department of Veterans Affairs for their disability.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 697 proposed by Senator Reid.
